text: intent: fix kg multi-instance isolation — mux.db, launcher PID, and mux_url were all globally shared, causing /agents pages to show wrong agents across instances

outcome: fixed mux_db_path and mux_pid_path to be per-instance (<root>/.kg/); inferred mux_url from mux_port via __post_init__; fixed launcher stop_background/launcher_status to take cfg; added SSE replay of last 50 turns on connect with lazy load-older endpoint; fixed syntax error + all 69 ruff lint errors

gotcha: launcher start falsely reported 'already running' because _LAUNCHER_PID was a module-level global constant pointing to ~/.local/share/kg/.launcher.pid — shared across all instances; fixed to cfg.kg_dir / .launcher.pid
